<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Lady Jingxi (The Poet of Dawn and Dusk)](/Deities.aspx?ID=178)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Create art with words, master the written language, display the soft beauty of natural colors

**Anathema** Destroy a natural plum tree, drink excessive amounts of alcohol, act rude or boorish

**Follower Alignments**
NG, N

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Intelligence or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12)

**Favored Weapon** [Fighting Fan](/Weapons.aspx?ID=284)

**Domains** [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=5), [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46), [Knowledge](/Domains.aspx?ID=17), [Repose](/Domains.aspx?ID=49)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

- **2nd**
[Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197)

- **5th**
[Chromatic Wall](/Spells.aspx?ID=37)

</column>
name: Lady Jingxi (The Poet of Dawn and Dusk)
